name: Phoenix Composite Solutions, LLC
about: Phoenix Composite Solutions, LLC, located in Oscoda, Michigan on the former Wurtsmith Air Force Base, is a woman-owned small business and HUB Zone qualified entity. We are an FAA-certified repair station (X4PR734X) and EASA certified (145.5623), specializing in advanced composite and metal structures. Our team, with over 100 years of combined experience, includes staff who have held top secret security clearances. We are committed to innovative design, rapid manufacture, and repair of aerospace components, with a principal design engineer who has designed over 1400 operational components. Our mission is to provide integrated solutions through continuous improvement and a value-added approach, ensuring the success of our customers. We are dedicated to becoming a leader in the aerospace industry through innovation and excellence.
